Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to next SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and subsequent Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time until SW-Reviewer Declined occurs after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time for SW-Reviewer Declined compared to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Average waiting time from SW-Reviewer Declined to next activity in process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent in sequences containing multiple SW-Reviewer Declined activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined occurs

Name: Minimum time between consecutive SW-Reviewer Declined activities in same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Total time impact of SW-Reviewer Declined on overall manuscript review duration
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Minimum time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time difference between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Total time lost due to SW-Reviewer Declined in review process variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Unassign Editor
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Editor'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time impact of SW-Reviewer Declined compared to SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response occurs

Name: Total duration of review cycles containing SW-Reviewer Declined versus SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in major revision variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
